definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)

sentences.english: Although he had had little formal education, he could read and write well.
sentences.chinese: 儘管他接受很少正規教育，但他的讀寫能力佷好。

sentences.english: And I think she play "Five Steps Chess"well.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得她玩“五子棋”佷厲害。

sentences.english: Well, Im a very passionate person and patient as well.
I'll never run a marathon, but I feel great.
sentences.chinese: 我永遠不可能去跑馬拉松，但是我感覺佷好。

sentences.english: I am glad to receive your letter.
sentences.chinese: 收到你的來信，我感到佷開心。

sentences.english: Her spoken English is very good and know lots of new words.
sentences.chinese: 她的英語口語佷好，而且她認識佷多的新單詞。

sentences.english: Her spoken English is very good and know lots of new words.
sentences.chinese: 她的英語口語佷好，而且她認識佷多的新單詞。

sentences.english: How long would it take them?They made that journey at least three times.
sentences.chinese: 這是一段佷遙遠的路程，但他們至少走了三次。

sentences.english: SCI was correlated with high-grade posterior element dissociation.
sentences.chinese: 脊髓損傷與後部結構分離有佷高的相關性。

sentences.english: The voice i heard on PP is very clear.
sentences.chinese: 機考的聲音佷清楚的，這一點不用擔心。

definition: expression of contempt equivalent to 呸[pei1]
to dawdle/the name of the father of the Emperor Yao
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
